attributes.action: Support moves to freeze and/or reduce pay awarded to public sector employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that reducing and freezing the pay of public sector employees will:
Provide some economic releif in these difficult times.
Reduce the number of job losses and service cuts that will undermine Britain's goals.
Do as much, if not more for equality, than any other policy to date.
